scenario_text.value: What the... Is this a doll or something?
Why’s my action figure in a place like this?!
Oh, this is yours, Minoru? Here, take it.

It’s an action figure of a Saturday morning
superhero that was on TV before I was born.
I’m sure I left it on my desk back home...
...It’s the first thing my dad ever gave me.

This might’ve been the start of everything,
now that I think about it.
Heheh, thanks for picking it up, my man!
